channel.title: FOOW – Chow Down Orlando
channel.description: Exploring all that Orlando has to offer.

item.title: Fish Out of Water
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
I am a big fan of sushi. There is something about eating raw fish that seems so right and so wrong all at the same time. I have to admit, however, that I was slightly skeptical about eating sushi from a food truck (I’m not sure why since there is nothing that I have eaten […]

The post Fish Out of Water appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
I am a big fan of sushi. There is something about eating raw fish that seems so right and so wrong all at the same time. I have to admit, however, that I was slightly skeptical about eating sushi from a food truck (I’m not sure why since there is nothing that I have eaten that came from a truck that I didn’t like). Fish out of Water didn’t disappoint. The only sushi roll I had was the spicy tuna, and it was one of the best spicy tuna rolls I have ever eaten. The fish was perfectly seasoned and topped with delicious sauce. To fulfill my love of potstickers, I had to give them a try too. FOOW has two versions of their potstickers: veggie and pork. I went for pork and had so much fun eating them. They were cooked to perfection and were absolutely delicious. If you love sushi or just want to give it a try, some of the best sushi in town can be found on a truck, just visit Fish out of Water to satisfy all of your sushi needs.

You can find Fish Out of Water by following them on Twitter.

The post Fish Out of Water appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
